name: Arduino Nano v3
tagline: The classic Arduino Nano is the smallest board to build your projects with.
details: The **Arduino Nano** is a small, complete, and breadboard-friendly board based on the ATmega328 (Arduino Nano 3.x). It has more or less the same functionality of the Arduino Duemilanove, but in a different package. It lacks only a DC power jack, and works with a Mini-B USB cable instead of a standard one.
